JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to use your strategic and technical mindset to have a large influence over your work? Are you looking for an opportunity to take the next step in your career?

Then we have the perfect position for you!

Your position 

As our new Integrated Service Manager, you will become a part of our Oil & Gas Service department in our Oil & Gas Division. Here we provide various offshore service solutions to our customers, including decommissioning projects, coatings, fabric maintenance campaigns, access solutions and overall providing tailored service deliveries.

You will become a part of a dedicated and passionate leadership team, and you will have around 6-8 direct reports being managers and project coordinators, who all together have around 60-70 direct reports.

Your tasks & responsibilities 

Your main area of responsibility will be developing and executing our integrated services and maintenance concept in close cooperation with the relevant stakeholders. Here you will also play a key role in modelling the strategy to ensure we continue providing of the best service and maintenance solutions for our customers going forward.  

In addition to the above, some of your daily tasks will include but are not limited to:

  • Communicating and collaborating closely with our customers in relation to needs, quotations, and other inquiries
  • Participating in the general strategic development of the Oil & Gas Service department
  • Providing motivating and inspiring leadership to a self-driven team of managers and coordinators
  • Integration with our electrical- instrument and mechanical branch in the department
  • Provide a seamless experience for our costumers during the entire process and hereby acting as an ambassador and strengthening our brand

Your profile & qualifications 

As a person you are honest and ambitious, and you have the necessary skills and competencies to live up to your ambitions. You are driven to create the best results possible with your innovative and strategic mindset.

Working closely with customers and utilizing your outgoing nature to establish good business relationships is something you enjoy. Having a busy day is something you look forward to and you enjoy having many ongoing projects at any given time.

To succeed in this position, we expect that you have the following qualifications:

  • Technical background and knowledge of the Oil & Gas industry and an understanding of how operations are carried out offshore
  • Educational background is not essential, but we imagine that you have an education as a marine engineer or similar technical education
  • Experience with quotations and sales of technical services
  • Practical hands-on experience from the industry is valued but not essential
  • Language proficiency in Danish and English, verbal and written

Welcome to Semco Maritime 

We offer you an interesting and challenging job in an international organization, where we strive to provide innovative and sustainable solutions globally. You will get the unique opportunity to work in an environment characterized by dedication, passion and ambition. 

You will work from our location in Esbjerg by the seafront, you should expect 30-35 travel days annually, and mainly in Denmark.

You will report directly to the Senior Director for our Oil & Gas Service.

We offer flexibility in terms of working in agreement with your manager. Furthermore, we have a great lunch program, an attractive pension agreement, insurance and more.

We conduct our interviews on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested, you must submit your application as soon as possible via the link on the page:

https://semcomaritime.career.emply.com/ad/integrated-service-manager/zw6mvq/en

If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact Tonny Popescu at +45 61 20 89 41.

We look forward to hearing from you!

 

Semco Maritime is an international engineering and contracting company dedicated to projects in the energy sector. For 40 years, we have been facilitating design, fabrication, service and maintenance of our customers’ assets, providing comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects. From turnkey engineering solutions to outsourcing of manpower and delivery of components, systems and solutions – we make sure our customers and partners in the energy sector experience safe and cost-efficient solutions. Semco Maritime has approx. 1,700 employees and branches in Denmark, Norway, United Kingdom, Germany, Singapore and the US.

For further information, please see www.semcomaritime.com
